docs.snippet: Wildlife advocates are ramping up their campaign against the annual culling of bison that roam onto state lands in Montana each winter from Yellowstone National Park, erecting dramatic billboards showing buffalo bleeding in the snow....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wildlife advocates are ramping up their campaign against the annual culling of bison that roam onto state lands in Montana each winter from Yellowstone National Park, erecting dramatic billboards showing buffalo bleeding in the snow.

headline.main: Montana Activists Ramp Up Campaign Against Culling Yellowstone Bison

docs.snippet: A St. Louis jury on Friday rejected a Tennessee woman's lawsuit that Johnson & Johnson baby powder contributed to her ovarian cancer, a victory for the company after it lost three previous, similar lawsuits in St. Louis....

docs.snippet: Experts monitoring freedom of expression at the United Nations and key regional organizations expressed concern Friday at the growing prevalence of "fake news" and propaganda — and alarm at public authorities denigrating the media as "lying"...
docs.lead_paragraph: Experts monitoring freedom of expression at the United Nations and key regional organizations expressed concern Friday at the growing prevalence of "fake news" and propaganda — and alarm at public authorities denigrating the media as "lying" or "the opposition."

headline.main: UN Experts Express Concern About Growth of 'Fake News'
headline.print_headline: UN Experts Express Concern About Growth of 'Fake News'
